abstract: Talk outlines Trunk-Branch-Leaf architecture for AI-assisted development: protect core, delegate branches, regenerate leaves. Emphasis on contracts-first, verification over implementation for leaves, and Waterfall for core with Agile leaves.
key_points: Contracts on boundaries: interfaces, OpenAPI, IaC
Upfront core environment investment, then faster iteration
LLMs struggle with cross-cutting refactors; strong core
Event-driven weak coupling requires explicit schemas
